turkish_example_sentence: Ben eski haritada hazineyi bulursam, hemen sana haber veririm.
english_example_sentence: If I find the treasure on the old map, I will immediately tell you.
russian_example_sentence: Если я найду сокровище на старой карте, я сразу тебе скажу.
